lessons.title: Loads on Structures
lessons.overview: Learn how dead loads, live loads, and environmental loads affect structural design.

blocks.heading: Concept overview
blocks.body: Dead loads are permanent (self-weight). Live loads change (people, furniture). Environmental loads include wind and earthquakes.

blocks.heading: Worked example
blocks.body: A simple beam supports a live load in the middle. The maximum bending moment occurs at midspan.

question.text: Which load type is usually variable over time in a building?

games.title: Build Your Own Bridge
games.description: Drag-and-drop a bridge, then test it under load.
